creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: group of eight men and women playing a ball game within a copse of blossoming trees; ball is suspended in air near tree at center; portion of building with green screens and a verandah at R
medium: Ink and color on gold leaf
text: Eight figures playing kickball amidst cherry trees and in front of room with veranda. The room with veranda is at the upper right corner. The figures from right panel to left:  First one is a male with shaved head, second is male with aristocratic hat with back turned, third is a young boy with long hair tied. Fourth figure is centrally located in composition; all are looking towards him. Fifth figure, in profile view, is also in aristocratic hat, sixth figure has shaved head, seventh also in aristocratic hat has hand up to his head, and last figure is also a young boy. All are in clothing with elaborate textile patterns.
title: Kemari Scene from the Tale of Genji
